# PKPaymentButtonStyle.automatic

**Case**

A button that automatically changes its appearance when the user switches between Light Mode and Dark Mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

The button uses the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentButtonStyle/white] style in Dark Mode and the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentButtonStyle/black] style in Light Mode.

## Payment button styles

- **PKPaymentButtonStyle.white**: A white button with black lettering.
- **PKPaymentButtonStyle.whiteOutline**: A white button with black lettering and a black outline.
- **PKPaymentButtonStyle.black**: A black button with white lettering.
